TextEng: Then get upset. I've come to kill you, dragon.
Text: 그럼 화내봐. 난 널 죽이러 왔으니까, 용이여.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Break the Ice Phylactery]</Start> I've got something up my sleeve alright!
Text: <StartAction>[얼음 성구함을 부숨]</Start> 내 소매에 뭔가 있거든!

TextEng: I want to talk about J'Nah.
I want to talk about the artifacts you stole.
Text: 네가 훔친 유물들에 대해 얘기하고 싶어.

TextEng: I want to talk about Deekin.
I think this rod is yours.
Never mind that. I'm here to kill you, dragon.
Text: 그건 됐고. 널 죽이러 왔어, 용이여.

TextEng: And if I haven't changed my mind?
Err... then I'll just go back the way I came...
Text: 어... 그럼 그냥 왔던 길로 돌아갈게...

TextEng: Then you leave me no choice. We fight.
And what would I get if I agreed?
Which proposal is that?
I think this rod is yours.
Actually, I've decided to kill you instead.
Text: 사실, 그 대신 널 죽이기로 했어.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Break the Ice Phylactery]</Start> I'm armed well, indeed.
No, she's not dead yet.
I've been thinking about my reward...
I want to be sure, first, that you'll honor your deal.
Text: 먼저 네가 약속을 지킬지 확실히 하고 싶어.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Lie]</Start> It's done. J'Nah is dead.
It's done. J'Nah is dead.
That's enough. I don't want anything.
The time has come for you to die.
I do not want any more "rewards" from you.
Text: 너한테서 "보상" 같은 건 더 이상 받고 싶지 않아.

TextEng: Perhaps you're right.
<StartAction>[Break the Ice Phylactery]</Start> My reward will be your death!
Text: <StartAction>[얼음 성구함을 부숨]</Start> 내 보상은 네 죽음이 될 거야!

TextEng: I want whatever artifacts you stole from Hilltop.
Text: 힐탑에서 훔친 유물이 뭐든 다 원해.

TextEng: Give me the mask artifact.
I want you to act as Hilltop's guardian against danger.
Text: 힐탑을 위험으로부터 지키는 수호자가 되길 원해.

TextEng: I want you to leave Hilltop alone from now on.
I want Deekin released from your service.
I want more gold and magic.
I would like gold and magic.
The time has come for you to die.
I would like to negotiate for the mask artifact.
Forget it.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> That's a little steep for something you don't want.
Very well. 300 gold it is.
Done. Here you go.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> I need that mask artifact, as well.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> I want whatever artifacts you stole from Hilltop.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 힐탑에서 훔친 유물이 뭐든 다 원해.

TextEng: Is there enough in the chest to free Deekin?
Text: 상자에 디킨을 풀어주기에 충분한 게 있어?

TextEng: I would like to negotiate for Deekin's freedom.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Would you consider releasing Deekin from your service, as well?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 디킨을 네 부하에서 풀어주는 것도 고려해 줄래?

TextEng: I should go.
I believe this rod is yours?
Yes, we're through.
But I don't want you to leave Hilltop alone... I want you to guard it from danger.
Text: 하지만 힐탑을 내버려 두는 건 원하지 않아... 위험으로부터 지키길 원해.

TextEng: Why not? Are you saying you can't do it?
Text: 왜 안 돼? 못 한다는 거야?

TextEng: Not always, just if it's ever threatened again.
You gave your oath, remember?
You did promise that Hilltop would be safe.
Forget it, then. I'll ask for something else.
No! That's not good enough!
That will have to do.
Uh-oh...
I figured as much. Have it your way, then.
Text: 그럴 줄 알았어. 그럼 네 뜻대로 해.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Break the Ice Phylactery]</Start> How about "phylactery"?
You traitorous creature! I'll kill you for this!
Text: 이 배신자 같은 놈! 이것 때문에 죽여주겠어!

TextEng: <StartAction>[Break the Ice Phylactery]</Start> How's this for a challenge?
Text: <StartAction>[얼음 성구함을 부숨]</Start> 이 정도면 도전이 되겠지?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> I'm warning you... attack me and I use this phylactery!
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> 경고하는데... 날 공격하면 이 성구함을 쓸 거야!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Is this really necessary? Can't we talk this over?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 정말 이래야 해? 얘기로 풀 수 없어?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> You know, this is just what J'Nah warned me you would do...
Text: <StartCheck>[통찰]</Start> 있잖아, 즈나가 네가 이럴 거라고 경고했거든...

TextEng: J'Nah told me you couldn't be trusted.
Text: 즈나가 널 믿을 수 없다고 했어.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> But you're so intelligent, I was sure you could be reasoned with that all this isn't necessary...
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 하지만 넌 정말 똑똑하잖아. 이런 게 필요 없다는 걸 이성적으로 이해할 수 있을 거라고 확신했는데...

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade/Bluff]</Start> So J'Nah was the more trustworthy of you two.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득/허세]</Start> 즈나가 너희 둘 중 더 믿을 만 하겠어.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade/Bluff]</Start> So she was right. You aren't noble and benevolent like other dragons.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득/허세]</Start> 그녀 말이 맞았어. 넌 다른 용들처럼 고귀하고 자비롭지 않네.

TextEng: But I thought you wanted J'Nah dead!
Text: 하지만 즈나가 죽길 원했던 거 아니었어!

TextEng: But you agreed to reward me!
Nothing. I should go.
What was your first clue?
What I am isn't important.
I'm hoping we can work together.
Text: 우리가 함께 일할 수 있길 바라지.

TextEng: I'm here to kill you, actually.
I will destroy you, dragon. Let's end this now.
<StartAction>[Break the Ice Phylactery]</Start> I have something to back up my threat, all right!
Text: <StartAction>[얼음 성구함을 부숨]</Start> 내 위협을 뒷받침할 게 있거든!

TextEng: You're responsible for nearly killing Master Drogan!
Text: 드로건 스승님을 거의 죽일 뻔한 건 네 책임이야!

TextEng: You must pay for sending your kobolds to attack Hilltop!
Text: 코볼트들을 보내 힐탑을 공격한 대가를 치러야 해!

TextEng: J'Nah may have sent me to kill you, but that doesn't mean I will do it.
Text: 즈나가 널 죽이라고 보냈지만, 그렇게 할 거란 뜻은 아니야.

TextEng: I want to talk about J'Nah.
Are you trying to shift responsibility for what you've done?
Text: 네가 한 일에 대한 책임을 떠넘기려는 거야?

TextEng: What does this have to do with me?
Why? What did this J'Nah do?
Which artifact was that?
J'Nah commands the gnolls, then?
Smart move on your part.
Actually, I killed her.
J'Nah is my enemy, as she is yours.
Text: 즈나는 네 적인 것처럼 내 적이야.

TextEng: I don't know.
Umm... life?
Umm... death?
Umm... gems?
Power?
Murder?
Revenge?
Revenge, of course.
Very well. I agree.
And should I refuse?
Then you leave me little choice. I agree.
Text: 그럼 선택의 여지가 별로 없네. 동의해.

TextEng: Then I refuse. I would rather kill you, beast.
Text: 그럼 거절해. 차라리 널 죽이겠어, 짐승 같은 놈.

TextEng: What do I get if I agree, then?
You would attack me?
What do I get for doing this?
I'll think of something later.
Magic interests me.
Gold sounds like a good start.
I want Deekin freed from your service.
I want the mask artifact.
I want any of the artifacts you took from Hilltop.
I want Hilltop to be safe.
How do I know you'll even keep your word?
It's a good start.
Not really, no.
Yes, Deekin must be freed.
And where do I find this J'Nah?
And just how would I be able to kill her?
Text: 그리고 어떻게 그녀를 죽일 수 있는데?

TextEng: Why not kill her yourself?
Who are these superiors of hers?
And what if I said I already killed her?
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> She sent me to arrange a truce between you.
Text: <StartAction>[거짓말]</Start> 그녀가 너희 사이에 휴전을 주선하라고 보냈어.

TextEng: No, but I've heard of her.
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> No, but I've heard of her.
She sent me to retrieve the tower statue.
And if I'm not?
I guess I'll hear your proposal, then.
Not if I kill you first, you won't.
She sent me to kill you, actually.
I can't back out, now. I have to kill you.
Text: 이제 물러설 수 없어. 널 죽여야 해.

TextEng: Wait! I've changed my mind!
I never intended to do as she asked, anyhow.
Text: 어차피 그녀가 요청한 대로 할 생각 없었어.

TextEng: I'm willing to listen to what you have to say.
Text: 네가 할 말을 들을 의향이 있어.

TextEng: But you didn't get all the artifacts, right?
Text: 하지만 유물을 다 가져가진 못했지, 그렇지?

TextEng: So you broke your deal with her?
So she lied about only wanting the tower statue?
Text: 그럼 탑 조각상만 원한다고 거짓말한 거네?

TextEng: But she said it was you who betrayed *her*.
Text: 하지만 그녀가 말하기론 *그녀*를 배신한 건 너래.

TextEng: But all J'Nah wanted was the tower statue. Why try to take the rest?
Text: 하지만 즈나가 원한 건 탑 조각상뿐이었잖아. 왜 나머지도 가져가려 한 거야?

TextEng: But why attack you if the deed was already done?
Text: 하지만 일이 이미 끝났는데 왜 널 공격해?

TextEng: The tower statue.
The two of you don't get along, do you?
Text: 너희 둘은 사이가 안 좋지, 그렇지?

TextEng: Odd. She says you deserve to die for the same reasons.
Text: 이상하네. 그녀도 같은 이유로 네가 죽어야 한다고 말하던데.

TextEng: I suppose it's a good thing I killed her, then?
Text: 그럼 내가 그녀를 죽인 건 잘한 거네?

TextEng: You sent those kobolds to attack Hilltop!
I have my sources.
I followed their tracks back here, actually.
Text: 사실, 그들의 발자국을 추적해서 여기까지 왔어.

TextEng: J'Nah told me all about it.
Deekin told me about you.
You just told me. That's how I know.
Text: 네가 방금 말했잖아. 그래서 아는 거야.

TextEng: I want to talk about the artifacts you stole.
Text: 네가 훔친 유물들에 대해 얘기하고 싶어.

TextEng: I'm here to talk to you about Deekin.
How badly do you want to know?
Deekin wants you dead.
Deekin said you sent the kobolds to attack Hilltop.
Text: 디킨이 네가 코볼트들을 보내 힐탑을 공격했다고 했어.

TextEng: He has an artifact that I need.
Text: 그가 내게 필요한 유물을 가지고 있어.

TextEng: Because I'm here to kill you so I can get it.
Text: 널 죽여서 그걸 얻으려고 여기 왔거든.

TextEng: Deekin's hidden it. He won't give it to me unless I prove to him you're dead.
Text: 디킨이 숨겨뒀어. 네가 죽었다는 걸 증명하지 않으면 주지 않아.

TextEng: Deekin's hidden it. He won't give it to me unless you free him from your service.
Text: 디킨이 숨겨뒀어. 네가 부하에서 풀어주지 않으면 주지 않아.

TextEng: I don't understand. Aren't you trying to collect all the artifacts?
Text: 이해가 안 가. 모든 유물을 모으려는 거 아니야?

TextEng: He wants to be free of your service.
Text: 그가 네 부하에서 자유로워지고 싶어 해.

TextEng: I'm not going to tell you that.
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> I believe he's deep within the High Forest.
Text: <StartAction>[거짓말]</Start> 높은 숲 깊은 곳에 있는 것 같아.

TextEng: He's probably hiding in Blumberg.
I believe this rod is yours?
I am not here to amuse you, dragon!
Text: 널 즐겁게 하려고 온 게 아니야!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade/Bluff]</Start> I am a great and powerful mage! You'd best beware.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득/허세]</Start> 난 위대하고 강력한 마법학자야! 조심하는 게 좋을 거야.

TextEng: I am a champion of law and justice above all else.
I may not be a knight, but I am a warrior.
I am a cleric, dragon. A servant of the gods.
I am a servant of nature, if you must know.
I am a master of the martial arts.
I am no knight. I am a wielder of the arcane arts.
I am a rogue, dragon, and nothing more.
I'm not certain I'd be better than your kobolds.
Text: 네 코볼트들보다 나을지 확신이 안 서.

TextEng: I could tell you a tale, if you're willing.
I can play you a song, if you wish.
Text: 원한다면 노래를 연주해 줄 수 있어.

TextEng: I am a bard, if you must know.
I'd prefer to discuss matters seriously.
I will not be toyed with, dragon!
Text: 장난감 취급 받진 않을 거야, 도마뱀 주제에!

TextEng: I do hope you're joking.
Play you a song? Certainly.
Of course I'm aware of that!
Have you never seen my kind before?
Err... you're a dragon, aren't you?
Are you Tymofarrar?
